title: The Spiritual Guy
description: http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00ALLZR1UAward winning author Jet Elway takes an irreverent look at the nebulous world of "enlightenment" by delving into his own rather dubious awakening. In this story he attempts to tease apart the realities of self-proclaimed enlightenment, narcissism, and mental illness.
author: Jet Elway
